<a id="AimModifier3D"></a>

# AimModifier3D

**Inherits:** [BoneConstraint3D](BoneConstraint3D.md) **\<** [SkeletonModifier3D](SkeletonModifier3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

The **AimModifier3D** rotates a bone to look at a reference bone.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This is a simple version of [LookAtModifier3D](LookAtModifier3D.md) that only allows bone to the reference without advanced options such as angle limitation or time-based interpolation.

The feature is simplified, but instead it is implemented with smooth tracking without euler, see [set_use_euler()](AimModifier3D.md#AimModifier3D_method_set_use_euler).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_get_forward_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[BoneAxis](SkeletonModifier3D.md#enum_SkeletonModifier3D_BoneAxis) **get_forward_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_get_forward_axis)

Returns the forward axis of the bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_get_primary_rotation_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Axis](Vector3.md#enum_Vector3_Axis) **get_primary_rotation_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_get_primary_rotation_axis)

Returns the axis of the first rotation. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](AimModifier3D.md#AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_using_euler**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler)

Returns ``true`` if it provides rotation with using euler.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_is_using_secondary_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_using_secondary_rotation**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_is_using_secondary_rotation)

Returns ``true`` if it provides rotation by two axes. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](AimModifier3D.md#AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_set_forward_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_forward_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md), axis\: [BoneAxis](SkeletonModifier3D.md#enum_SkeletonModifier3D_BoneAxis)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_set_forward_axis)

Sets the forward axis of the bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_set_primary_rotation_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_primary_rotation_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md), axis\: [Axis](Vector3.md#enum_Vector3_Axis)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_set_primary_rotation_axis)

Sets the axis of the first rotation. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](AimModifier3D.md#AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_set_use_euler"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_use_euler**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md), enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_set_use_euler)

If sets `enabled` to ``true``, it provides rotation with using euler.

If sets `enabled` to ``false``, it provides rotation with using rotation by arc generated from the forward axis vector and the vector toward the reference.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AimModifier3D_method_set_use_secondary_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_use_secondary_rotation**\ (\ index\: [int](int.md), enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AimModifier3D_method_set_use_secondary_rotation)

If sets `enabled` to ``true``, it provides rotation by two axes. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](AimModifier3D.md#AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.
